data.title: The knights of the cross. By: Henryk Sienkiewicz, translation from the polish: By: Jeremiah Curtin (1835-1906). VOLUME 2. Teutonic Knights, Crusades
data.meta_description: Henryk Adam Aleksander Pius Sienkiewicz ( also known by the pseudonym "Litwos" 5 May 1846 - 15 November 1916) was a Polish journalist, novelist and the Nobel Prize laureate. He is best remembered for his historical novels, especially for his internationally known best-seller Quo Vadis (1896). Born into an impoverished
data.text: SureShot Books Publishing LLC is part of the SureShot 2k family of companies that was founded in 1990 to help the families of prison inmates, by providing reasonably priced books, newspapers, & magazines.
